roleset.name: capable of success
roleset.note: VIABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. (from viable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Oh and just because there are reserves it does not mean they are financially viable , plus the TNC could just tell us to **** off like Iraq did .

example.name: both args
example.text: it's pretty much like asking if a rogue is viable as primary controller in a dungeon... maybe it could?
example.arg: as a primary controller in a dungeon
